verses.verse: נִבְחָ֣ר <S%H977><s%> [is] rather to be chosen שֵׁ֭ם <S%H8034><s%> A [good] name מֵעֹ֣שֶׁר <S%H6239><s%> riches רָ֑ב <S%H7227><s%> than great מִכֶּ֥סֶף <S%H3701><s%> rather than silver וּ֝מִזָּהָ֗ב <S%H2091><s%> and gold חֵ֣ן <S%H2580><s%> favour טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> [and] loving
עָשִׁ֣יר <S%H6223><s%> The rich וָרָ֣שׁ <S%H7326><s%> and poor נִפְגָּ֑שׁוּ <S%H6298><s%> meet together עֹשֵׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> [is] the maker כֻלָּ֣ם <S%H3605><s%> all יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

עָר֤וּם ׀ <S%H6175><s%> A prudent רָאָ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> [man] foreseeth רָעָ֣ה <S%H7451><s%> the evil [וְיִסָּתֵר כ] (וְנִסְתָּ֑ר <S%H5641><s%> be absent ק) וּ֝פְתָיִ֗ים <S%H6612><s%> himself but the simple עָבְר֥וּ <S%H5674><s%> pass on וְֽנֶעֱנָֽשׁוּ׃ <S%H6064><s%> and are punished

עֵ֣קֶב <S%H6118><s%> By עֲ֭נָוָה <S%H6038><s%> humility יִרְאַ֣ת <S%H3374><s%> [and] the fear יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עֹ֖שֶׁר <S%H6239><s%> [are] riches וְכָב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> and honour וְחַיִּֽים׃ <S%H2416><s%> and life

צִנִּ֣ים <S%H6791><s%> Thorns פַּ֭חִים <S%H6341><s%> [and] snares בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> [are] in the way עִקֵּ֑שׁ <S%H6141><s%> of the froward שׁוֹמֵ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> he that doth keep נַ֝פְשׁ֗וֹ <S%H5315><s%> his soul יִרְחַ֥ק <S%H7368><s%> shall be far מֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

חֲנֹ֣ךְ <S%H2596><s%> Train up לַ֭נַּעַר <S%H5288><s%> a child עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> he should go דַרְכּ֑וֹ <S%H1870><s%> in the way גַּ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> Even כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when יַ֝זְקִ֗ין <S%H2204><s%> and when he is old לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> he will not יָס֥וּר <S%H5493><s%> he will not depart מִמֶּֽנָּה׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

עָ֭שִׁיר <S%H6223><s%> The rich בְּרָשִׁ֣ים <S%H7326><s%> over the poor יִמְשׁ֑וֹל <S%H4910><s%> ruleth וְעֶ֥בֶד <S%H5650><s%> [is] servant לֹ֝וֶ֗ה <S%H3867><s%> and the borrower לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> he מַלְוֶֽה׃ <S%H3867><s%> the lender's

זוֹרֵ֣עַ <S%H2232><s%> He that soweth עַ֭וְלָה <S%H5766><s%> iniquity [יִקְצֹור־ כ] (יִקְצָר־ <S%H7114><s%> will reap אָ֑וֶן <S%H7114><s%> shall reap ק) וְשֵׁ֖בֶט <S%H7626><s%> and the rod עֶבְרָת֣וֹ <S%H5678><s%> of his anger יִכְלֶֽה׃ <S%H3615><s%> shall fail

טֽוֹב־ <S%H2896><s%> He that hath a bountiful עַ֭יִן <S%H5869><s%> eye ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יְבֹרָ֑ךְ <S%H1288><s%> shall be blessed כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נָתַ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> for he giveth מִלַּחְמ֣וֹ <S%H3899><s%> of his bread לַדָּֽל׃ <S%H1800><s%> to the poor

גָּ֣רֵֽשׁ <S%H1644><s%> Cast out לֵ֭ץ <S%H3887><s%> the scorner וְיֵצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> shall go out מָד֑וֹן <S%H4066><s%> and contention וְ֝יִשְׁבֹּ֗ת <S%H7673><s%> shall cease דִּ֣ין <S%H1779><s%> yea strife וְקָלֽוֹן׃ <S%H7036><s%> and reproach

אֹהֵ֥ב <S%H157><s%> He that loveth [טְהֹור־ כ] (טְהָר־ <S%H2889><s%> clean לֵ֑ב <S%H2890><s%> pureness ק) חֵ֥ן <S%H2580><s%> [for] the grace שְׂ֝פָתָ֗יו <S%H8193><s%> of his lips רֵעֵ֥הוּ <S%H7453><s%> [shall be] his friend מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king

עֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> The eyes יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD נָ֣צְרוּ <S%H5341><s%> preserve דָ֑עַת <S%H1847><s%> knowledge וַ֝יְסַלֵּ֗ף <S%H5557><s%> and he overthroweth דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> the words בֹגֵֽד׃ <S%H898><s%> of the transgressor

אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> [man] saith עָ֭צֵל <S%H6102><s%> The slothful אֲרִ֣י <S%H738><s%> [There is] a lion בַח֑וּץ <S%H2351><s%> without בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in רְ֝חֹב֗וֹת <S%H7339><s%> the streets אֵֽרָצֵֽחַ׃ <S%H7523><s%> I shall be slain

שׁוּחָ֣ה <S%H7745><s%> pit עֲ֭מֻקָּה <S%H6013><s%> [is] a deep פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> The mouth זָר֑וֹת <S%H2114><s%> of strange women זְע֥וּם <S%H2194><s%> he that is abhorred יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD [יִפֹּול־ כ] (יִפָּל־ <S%H5307><s%> will fall שָֽׁם׃ <S%H5307><s%> shall fall ק)

אִ֭וֶּלֶת <S%H200><s%> Foolishness קְשׁוּרָ֣ה <S%H7194><s%> [is] bound בְלֶב־ <S%H3820><s%> in the heart נָ֑עַר <S%H5288><s%> of a child שֵׁ֥בֶט <S%H7626><s%> [but] the rod מ֝וּסָ֗ר <S%H4148><s%> of correction יַרְחִיקֶ֥נָּה <S%H7368><s%> shall drive it far מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> who

עֹ֣שֵֽׁק <S%H6231><s%> He that oppresseth דָּ֭ל <S%H1800><s%> the poor לְהַרְבּ֣וֹת <S%H7235><s%> to increase ל֑וֹ נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> his [riches and] he that giveth לְ֝עָשִׁ֗יר <S%H6223><s%> to the rich אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> only לְמַחְסֽוֹר׃ <S%H4270><s%> [shall] surely [come] to want

הַ֥ט <S%H5186><s%> Bow down אָזְנְךָ֗ <S%H241><s%> thine ear וּ֭שְׁמַע <S%H8085><s%> and hear דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> the words חֲכָמִ֑ים <S%H2450><s%> of the wise וְ֝לִבְּךָ֗ <S%H3820><s%> thine heart תָּשִׁ֥ית <S%H7896><s%> and apply לְדַעְתִּֽי׃ <S%H1847><s%> unto my knowledge

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> if נָ֭עִים <S%H5273><s%> For [it is] a pleasant thing כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> if תִשְׁמְרֵ֣ם <S%H8104><s%> if thou keep בְּבִטְנֶ֑ךָ <S%H990><s%> them within יִכֹּ֥נוּ <S%H3559><s%> be fitted יַ֝חְדָּ֗ו <S%H3162><s%> thee they shall withal עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שְׂפָתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H8193><s%> in thy lips

לִהְי֣וֹת <S%H1961><s%> may be in בַּ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> may be in the LORD מִבְטַחֶ֑ךָ <S%H4009><s%> That thy trust הוֹדַעְתִּ֖יךָ <S%H3045><s%> I have made known הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> to thee this day אַף־ <S%H637><s%> even אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> you

הֲלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not כָתַ֣בְתִּי <S%H3789><s%> Have not I written לְ֭ךָ [שִׁלְשֹׁום כ] (שָׁלִישִׁ֑ים <S%H8032><s%> before that time ק) בְּמ֖וֹעֵצֹ֣ת <S%H4156><s%> in counsels וָדָֽעַת׃ <S%H1847><s%> and knowledge

לְהוֹדִֽיעֲךָ֗ <S%H3045><s%> That I might make thee know קֹ֭שְׁטְ <S%H7189><s%> the certainty אִמְרֵ֣י <S%H561><s%> of the words אֱמֶ֑ת <S%H571><s%> of truth לְהָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> that thou mightest answer אֲמָרִ֥ים <S%H561><s%> the words אֱ֝מֶ֗ת <S%H571><s%> of truth לְשֹׁלְחֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H7971><s%> to them that send פ אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּגְזָל־ <S%H1497><s%> catch

דָּ֭ל <S%H1800><s%> not the poor כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because דַל־ <S%H1800><s%> because he [is] poor ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תְּדַכֵּ֖א <S%H1792><s%> neither oppress עָנִ֣י <S%H6041><s%> the afflicted בַשָּֽׁעַר׃ <S%H8179><s%> in the gate

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יְ֭הוָה <S%H3069><s%> God יָרִ֣יב <S%H7378><s%> will plead רִיבָ֑ם <S%H7379><s%> their cause וְקָבַ֖ע <S%H6906><s%> and spoil אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קֹבְעֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H6906><s%> of those that spoiled נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <S%H5315><s%> the soul

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּ֭תְרַע <S%H7462><s%> Make no friendship אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with בַּ֣עַל <S%H1167><s%> man אָ֑ף <S%H639><s%> with an angry וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man חֵ֝מוֹת <S%H2534><s%> and with a furious לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Or תָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> thou shalt not go

פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> Or תֶּאֱלַ֥ף <S%H502><s%> Lest thou learn [אָרְחָתֹו כ] (אֹֽרְחֹתָ֑יו <S%H734><s%> manner ק) וְלָקַחְתָּ֖ <S%H3947><s%> and get מוֹקֵ֣שׁ <S%H4170><s%> a snare לְנַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H5315><s%> to thy soul

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תְּהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become בְתֹֽקְעֵי־ <S%H8628><s%> Be not thou [one] of them that strike כָ֑ף <S%H3709><s%> hands בַּ֝עֹרְבִ֗ים <S%H6148><s%> [or] of them that are sureties מַשָּׁאֽוֹת׃ <S%H4859><s%> for debts אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> else

לְךָ֥ לְשַׁלֵּ֑ם <S%H7999><s%> If thou hast nothing to pay לָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why יִקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> why should he take away מִ֝שְׁכָּבְךָ֗ <S%H4904><s%> thy bed מִתַּחְתֶּֽיךָ׃ <S%H8478><s%> under

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תַּ֭סֵּג <S%H5253><s%> Remove גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> landmark עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> not the ancient אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> Which עָשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> have set אֲבוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1><s%> which thy fathers

חָזִ֡יתָ <S%H2372><s%> Seest אִ֤ישׁ ׀ <S%H376><s%> thou a man מָ֘הִ֤יר <S%H4106><s%> diligent בִּמְלַאכְתּ֗וֹ <S%H4399><s%> business לִֽפְנֵֽי־ <S%H6440><s%> before מְלָכִ֥ים <S%H4428><s%> kings יִתְיַצָּ֑ב <S%H3320><s%> he shall not stand בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> He will not יִ֝תְיַצֵּב <S%H3320><s%> stand לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before חֲשֻׁכִּֽים׃ <S%H2823><s%> mean פ
